collection.name: Love Spell: Written In The Stars

name: Love Spell: Written In the Stars – Aslan's Story
summary:
Love Spell: Aslan's Route is the first DLC for Love Spell: Written In The Stars. It features the story and the ability to romance a brand-new bachelor, Aslan the Wizard, who was not playable in the original game.

Follow Luna's adventure through different worlds when she accidentally ends up chasing the mysterious pink-haired wizard named Aslan through a magical portal and straight into a parallel universe!
